position: Director of Business Development at HRG Investment Group

experience.title: Director Of Business Development
experience.description: • Provide investors seeking rapid growth in unconventional industries the education, guidance and support required to maximize profits both from a short and long-term perspective through their entire investment journey.• Acquiring companies within the service industry which allow HRG Investment Group to develop investment strategies aiming to provide targeted exposure to early-stage market disruptors in the market.• Comprehensive financial planning and advisory investment options—everything coordinated by one team of professionals, all under one roof.• Prioritize providing superior customer service and a return on investment that makes a real difference to our clients and stakeholders.• We currently offer the below investment products for our retail and institutional investors:- HRG ASSET SECURE: A hassle-free asset-backed investment with fixed returns- HRG REAL ESTATE: Identify a suitable property and manage its revenue generation to attain the highest ROI possible.- HRG EMERGE: A fund dedicated for entrepreneurs and innovative “market disruptive” business ventures

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: • Responsible for day to day management of sales support activities for the sales team including providing performance data for fiduciary clients, answering client queries on products and other sales related matters.• Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives. Researching organizations and individuals to find new opportunities.• Build excellent client relationships offering value-added, insightful and strategic input to their business at the pitch stage, proposal stage and presentation stage;• Developing goals for the development team and business growth and ensuring they are met. Finding and developing new markets and improving sales.• Contacting potential clients to establish rapport. Lead generation and early focus on booking meetings with potential buyers.• Complete account management of existing customers including key account contact, identifying new growth areas, managing pricing and closing agreement/contracts. Communicating new product developments to prospective clients.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: • Build, mobilize and coordinate cross functional project objectives and to ensure timely completion of Projects as per the desired outcome.• Support team members in identifying areas of process improvement and guide in project planning to ensure that all processed are per established procedures to minimize risk exposure.• Apply Business Process Improvement projects and collaborate with the concerned stakeholders to ensure new improves processed are established with the technological modifications.• Develop KPI’s, perform diagnostics to identify performance gaps, provide solutions by identifying the problem areas and monitor progress on business process performance indicators against performance metrics to ensure achievement of desired results.• Track and review project implementation and provide regular updates on project progress to the stakeholders to ensure projects are progressing as per project charter.• Support regional audits/validations (both internal and external) to ensure compliance with relevant statutory guidelines and laws (Federal Customs Authority, Dubai Customs, Abu Dhabi Customs, & Saudi Customs).

experience.title: External Auditor
experience.description: • Financial audit planning, risk assessments, analytical procedures, agreed upon procedures, review and assistance in the preparation of financial statements and audit reports as well as other procedures to enhance shareholder value including focused reviews of the clients business processes and internal control systems. It also includes collating and discussing internal controls weaknesses, audit findings as well as recommendations with the client.• Wide range of experience in industries such as manufacturing, consumer and industrial products, oil and gas related services, & hospitality.• Planning: understanding the entity's business, business cycles, management structure, materiality, risk assessment, etc.• Proficient knowledge of International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and UAE Federal Law, International Auditing Standards (IAS) for reporting on standalone or consolidated financial statements.
